title: [Placements] This must be a fucking joke
content:
is that ibm shortlist just   
random.randint(0,1000)   
never seen something like this man

comments.body: It's not random I guess; It's based on completion and plagiarism I guess; Like people who completed all 2 and not flagged by hackerrank plagiarism detection got shortlisted.
If you copied/cheated, you probably got plagiarized.
I'm done with these retarded online coding platforms. Placements are now just who cheats the best. And who gets the most retarded interviewer.
Everything is just luck based from getting shortlisted for oa to landing a job.
Yeah true bro all of the shorlisted students cleared on their own. my bad.
bruh plzzz ik some people who cheat and got shortlisted and i solved both on my own and did not get
